mention.text: a `` demobilization plan '' that would entail the end of drug trafficking activities , the surrender of weapons , and the repatriation of capital in exchange for a pardon
the united states a judicial pardon for colombians wanted by u.s. federal courts

the biggest obstacle in the negotiations process `` because the colombian officials did not find a way to discuss the matter with the u.s. administration , which has decided to fight the problem militarily
a tripartite dialogue between colombia and the united states and the european countries on the nonextradition of colombians
an essential requirement for montoya to go ahead with the pacification contacts
alvaro leyva , presidential hopeful of the opposition social conservative party who secured the documents that la prensa published
a sad thing dead men can not speak , particularly those who always thought the government meant business , and who thought that in this country authorities do what they say they will
